content.en: Scheduling optimization: Researchers have been investigating various aspects of scheduling problems in a two-machine flow shop. They have developed algorithms to find optimal schedules, minimize makespan and maximum earliness, and minimize total late work, among other objectives. These algorithms, such as enumerative algorithms, branch-and-bound procedures, and heuristic algorithms, are designed to efficiently solve these scheduling problems and improve efficiency.
content.da: Planlægningsoptimering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige aspekter af planlægningsproblemer i en to-maskine flow shop. De har udviklet algoritmer for at finde optimale tidsplaner, minimere makespan og maksimal tidlighed, samt minimere samlet forsinket arbejde, blandt andre mål. Disse algoritmer, såsom enumerative algoritmer, branch-and-bound procedurer og heuristiske algoritmer, er designet til at effektivt løse disse planlægningsproblemer og forbedre effektiviteten.
